title: Heuristics to reduce the chaos in life
---

I'm a big fan of simple things that abstract a lot of complexity and add value to my life. However, it's difficult to find them unless they come from generational knowledgeâ€”the kind of wisdom your parents passed down, which you follow out of habit built over the years.

A good generational example is _waking up early_â€”and, of course, its counterpart, _going to sleep early_.
